description: Yurippe who is known as is without a last name, is the girl from Tani`s childhood memories. From Tani`s recollection, she gives Tani home-made cookies. Yurippe is probably Tani`s only known love interest. Tani recalled these past memories after the school nurse, Anegasaki Tae, gave him cookies as a kind gesture.
name: Yurippe
